message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.HC. 

This paper focuses on emotion recognition in dialog systems, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and human-computer interaction (HCI). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a hierarchical transformer network, which is a deep learning model, so cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with the problem of data shortage, which is a common issue in NLP, so cs.SD (Sound) is a possible sub-category as well.
